glosses.content: The phrase 'In the name of Allah, the Most Merciful, the Most Compassionate' opens the Qur’an and nearly every surah, invoking divine mercy before all speech or action.
'ar-Raḥmān' and 'ar-Raḥīm' both derive from the root R-Ḥ-M (mercy), emphasizing God's encompassing and ongoing compassion.
